'''"Musketeer Pictures Prize Commemoration"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Musketeer Pictures Prize Commemoration" is obtained from the {{Quest|The Two Musketeers' Triumph (Quest)}}.
